oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dr. Charles Bonner carte-de-visite
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte-de-visite of Dr. Charles Bonner, father of Kate Sherwood Bonner of Holly Springs, Mississippi. He operated a field hospital, caring for the wounded from the Battle of Shiloh and other battles in Mississippi. Dr. Bonner died in September 1878 of yellow fever.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Fort Negley, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
